docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: TO THOSE WHO HAVE TROUBLE hearing a doorbell ring or a baby cry, the computer has become as significant as the hearing aid itself.
docs.snippet: LEAD: TO THOSE WHO HAVE TROUBLE hearing a doorbell ring or a baby cry, the computer has become as significant as the hearing aid itself.
